General.Name: Norseman Capital Ltd
General.Description: Norseman Silver Inc., a junior natural resource company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada and Argentina. It holds an option agreement to acquire a 100% interest in certain mining claims located in the Province of British Columbia; and a 100% interest in the Taquetren silver project covering an area of 285 square kilometers located in the Navidad-Calcatreau mining district, Argentina. The company was formerly known as Norseman Capital Ltd. and changed its name to Norseman Silver Inc. in September 2020. Norseman Silver Inc. was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 999 West Hastings Street (Mailbox 55), Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2W2
